amenable.translation[0].definitions[0].d: willing to accept what someone says or does without arguing
amenable.translation[0].definitions[0].e: She was always a very amenable child.
Young people are more amenable than older citizens to the idea of immigration.
amenable.translation[0].definitions[1].d: suitable for a particular type of treatment
amenable.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Such conditions may be amenable to medical intervention.
